snippet.title: The Escapists- Duct Tapes Are Forever DLC Trailer (PC)
snippet.description:
Captured by a heinous villain and trapped in his underground lair, you must use all your spy cunning to sneak into restricted areas and gather the necessary items you’ll need to craft together to pull off your explosive break for freedom! 

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/408730/

The Escapists – Duct Tapes Are Forever DLC features:
• An exclusive new underground villainous lair to escape from
• 6 brand new achievements/trophies to unlock
• Leader board 

Team17, founded in 1990, are a fully independent video game developer and publisher responsible for the Worms™ series, Alien Breed and Superfrog. Ensure you never miss out on our latest videos by subscribing to us now: http://bit.ly/SubscribeTeam17

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Escapists_Game
